Name:
* RUS disqualified from the competition as two of the athletes in the Russian team (Antonina Krivoshapka and Yuliya Gushchina) were disqualified for doping. 




Women's 4x400 m - Athletics - London 2012 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     Teams competed in preliminary heats and final. The best teams from each heat (Q) and a number of "lucky losers" (q) advanced to the final. The winner of the final was the winner of the Gold Medal. Event facts: Women's 4x400 m competition was held at the Olympic Stadium and 16  teams participated in the event.

Name:
* One member of the team (Marion Jones) disqualified for doping. After an appeal the Court of Arbitration for Sports (CAS)on July 16, 2010 has decided that the USA team was not disqualified. Only Marion Jones had to return her medal.

     Teams competed in preliminary heats and final. The best teams from each heat (Q) and a number of "lucky losers" (q) advanced to the final.
